post.title: News Aggregation
post.content: I’ve been using FeedReader for aggregating news feeds, but I just downloaded and configured Syndirella. I think I’m going to switch permanently since Syndirella handles some of the 2.0 RSS feeds that FeedReader can’t. (I want to try News Gator, but I’m not running a compatible version of Outlook). Additionally, Syndirella is a .NET app, which I like even if it has little bearing on the apps’ functionallity.
